column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent

#Text=I am bringing with me a new way to undertake the development of Brampton ; a new policy that would see the reduction of the gap between Bramptonians and the council actions ; I have with me a new alternative that would make each person living in Brampton really feel at home .
#Text=I would give to each inhabitant of my wards , the real feeling of being in a city that really fit his desire .
#Text=Q :
#Text=How are you currently involved in the community ?
#Text=A :
#Text=I am in many aspects an example within my community and I strive to keep that as effective as possible .
#Text=I am a leader in my community and I have presided or I am an active member of many non for profit organization working to ameliorate people life and/or to welcome newcomers in our city .
#Text=I am a dedicate volunteer and always preach by example in an exceptional dedication with the purpose to always have the job well done .
#Text=Q :
#Text=Much of Brampton 's existing council is seasoned in the civic political process .
#Text=What could you bring to the table as a " rookie " , above and beyond the current roster of councilors ?
#Text=A :
#Text=The present council seems to be away of the reality in this fast growing city .
#Text=They are veterans , with all respect , they are in urgent need of retirement .
#Text=We 're grateful of their effort and commitment for all these years , but we must now realize that they are all running out of ideas .
#Text=They 've been cut off guard by the population growth and they seem to be trailing behind looking desperately for ways to catch up with a train speeding away .
#Text=The best way to give a better future to our city is to give the chance to " rookies " to come in with fresh mind and fresh ideas that would help our city to cope with this sudden growth .
#Text=We need to rejuvenate the council chamber and create some sort of positive actions that would consolidate the path of Brampton in this twenty first century .
#Text=We all appreciate the hard work done by our predecessors , but it is the time to look beyond their path of actions and act accordingly to keep Brampton into the right direction .
#Text=Brampton has now a diverse culture and ethnicity that in reality should be our strength .
#Text=The existing council , despite their talk , is not really walking the talk .
#Text=There are no actions to really create a sense of belongings to these newcomers in our city .
#Text=Without a doubt there is need of new energy , a need of rejuvenation .
#Text=There are obvious actions that a council should tackle which have n't been done properly .
#Text=Certainly they 've been there so long that they do n't see any pressure or obligation .
#Text=We must work to support our youth , seniors and people with special needs .
#Text=We must improve on the present infrastructure and develop the public transit within Brampton and beyond .
#Text=Of course , the safety measures are paramount and it is important to create a great atmosphere of respect and collaboration between Police and the community .
#Text=We must not forget that the community is important in solving many crimes .
